TopicTitle: Make Contracts visible in the VAB/SPH

Articles.Content: Please make contracts visible in the Assembly/Hanger. It's difficult to remember what all you're trying to arrange on a ship if you've got 10+ random 'in orbit' contracts going at once, especially if you're trying to get things in the right order for flight height and speeds.
It's ingame already. Lower right corner, next to reset stages button.

It's ingame already. Lower right corner, next to reset stages button.

this. it's the button that looks like a sheet of paper with writing on it. a contract, if you will
D'oh, so it is. Sorry, I'd completely missed that...
